text: aur (jo tumane dekha hai) aisa hee hoga ki tumhaara paravaradigaar tumako baraguzeeda (ijzatadaar) karega aur tumhen khvaabo kee taabeer sikhaega aur jis tarah isase pahale tumhaare daada paradaada ibaraaheem aur isahaaq par apanee neamat pooree kar chuka hai aur isee tarah tum par aur yaaqoob kee aulaad par apanee neamat pooree karega beshak tumhaara paravaradigaar bada vaaqiphakaar hakeem hai
